name: CreateGithubProjectBoard
description:
Create a project board for a GitHub repository.

This tool creates a project board for a specified GitHub repository. It's useful when you want to organize tasks or issues in the form of a project board within a repository. It returns information about the creation status and any errors due to disabled projects or insufficient privileges.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The username of the account that owns the repository. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. It is not case-sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: The name of the project board to be created in the repository.

parameters.name: project_description
parameters.description: Provide a descriptive text for the project board to help clarify its purpose and content.
